title: Event Management Website
description: Designed and integrated user authentication features, including login, signup & password reset functionalities using Nodemailer, ensuring secure access and user management.
details: Designed and integrated user authentication features, including login, signup & password reset functionalities using Nodemailer, ensuring secure access and user management. Developed an admin panel for streamlined event management & used Postman to test API endpoints.

title: Myntra Clone Website
details: Ensured compatibility across various devices & screen sizes with fully functional shopping cart interface with add, update, and remove item features. Developed a full-featured E-Commerce Website Clone of Myntra using React.js.

details: Developed a responsive website for selling flats and villas in Noida, featuring detailed property listings, virtual tours, advanced search functionalities, user-friendly interface, and secure online booking options to enhance customer engagement and streamline the property buying process.

title: Innovative Interior, Gurgaon
details: Created a Fully Functional Website related to the products of Interior Design and perfect use of EmailJS to send the feedback. Developed a comprehensive Single Page Application (SPA) using React.js, providing a seamless and dynamic user experience.

title: Weather Project

details: Designed and developed a dynamic weather project website, providing real-time weather information for cities worldwide. Leveraged HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to create a user-friendly interface that allows users to easily access weather data for their desired locations.
